name: Rikako & Cirno -White Ops
description:
It's Gensokyo's annual snowball tournament and someone's been causing trouble, sweeping off any competition and making yokai go rampant. It's up to Rikako and her (Cirno-powered) Snow Launcher BK-9 to do some field testing and maybe deal with this issue while she's at it.

Submission for Touhou Fan Game Jam 10
https://itch.io/jam/touhou-jam-10

Controls and mechanics:

Move - WASD
Aim - Mouse
Shoot - Hold Left Click
Pause - Escape
Focus - Shift

Focus - Allows you to move slower and displays Rikako's hitbox.
Freeze Burst - Upon getting hit, Cirno will release a burst of ice that will destroy all proyectiles around you.
Hot Chocolate - Collect this item to heal, if your health bar depletes you will lose and will be forced to restart the stage.
